title: Monday.com Customer Testimonials Review: Real-World Impact and Benefits
content: monday.com has a dedicated 'Customer stories' section on their website and a 'Reviews' center highlighting user testimonials and ratings from sites like G2 and TrustRadius. Specific examples of monday.com customer stories and their benefits include Thoughtworks, which increased operational efficiency by budgeting team time and efforts more scientifically. Telefonica (O2 Priority) achieved 30% more efficiency in delivering hundreds of campaigns. A Global Marketing Department saw a 40% improvement in cross-team collaboration for campaign planning and execution. Howard Kennedy (a law firm) used monday.com to better align business strategies and operations. Wix utilized monday.com to efficiently grow from 50 to over 1,000 employees. Officeworks streamlined workflows, document management, and communication. Citizens Bank used monday.com for CRM needs and custom boards for various functions, reducing time on manual tasks. Zippo saved three business days a month by reducing the need for spreadsheets and in-person meetings. Flight Centre saved 517 hours per month. monday.com is described as a versatile platform used for project management, CRM, marketing campaigns, incident tracking, and more, with customizable tools and templates. It helps teams with collaboration, task tracking, resource management, and financial planning. The platform is praised for its modern, intuitive, and visually appealing dashboard, as well as its customizability and integrations. Users have also highlighted improved efficiency, advanced reporting, and good customer service. These testimonials collectively demonstrate monday.com's effectiveness in driving operational efficiencies, cost reductions, and improved collaboration across diverse industries and use cases.
